Pensacola.Pensacola Christian Academy:
Pensacola Christian Academy (PCA) is a private elementary through high school institution located in Pensacola, Florida, United States.


== History ==
The school was founded as Pensacola Christian School in 1954 by Arlin Horton (who later established Pensacola Christian College) and his wife Beka. PCS began in a three classroom building, offering only three classes from kindergarten through second grade.
